title: 5 Low Grade T3's for Sale or Trade
author: Archive

posts.post_title: 5 Low Grade T3's for Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Brailey
T3's for Sale or Trade:

#3   Leach - Pittsbug (checklist back) $130
No pin holes, staining spots front, no paper loss, good color.

#7   Camnitz - Pittsburg (checklist back) $100
Pin holes, some staining mostly on reverse, good color, no paper loss.

#84  Browne - Wash & Chgo Amer (checklist back) $100
Staining, pin hole center top, registry a bit off.

#110 McBride - Washington (checklist back) $100
No pin holes, satining top border+. creasing, very minor paper loss reverse.

#125 Walsh (HOF) - Chicago Amer (Turkey Red Ad back) $300
Great color and focus, pin hole top and bottom center, corners a bit rough, pencil marks top front border, minor creasing.

Scans available on request.

Postage included.  Take all 5 for $675.

Contact me at mikebrailey@yahoo.com if interested.

Thanks,
Mike
